name: Hop Step Sing! Nozokanaide Naked Heart (HQ Edition)
description: Enjoy the song and performance in this VR music video set in a virtual world. This time, your destination is a magic factory where the wounded hearts of the world go to be healed. As the girls' leader, it's your job to bring a smile back to the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0 or better port also required
